```
[microbenchmarks] No significant performance differences
```

I've talked to @ctiller about this, and indeed performance is a concern. The working plan is to leverage @y-zeng 's backup poller (https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/12732). The LB instance would inform the backup poller of the ratio of available subchannels, so that as that ratio decreases, polling frequency would increase and activity happening on "background" subchannels be picked up. 

Closing this PR, will create a new one for the aforementioned alternative approach.
